notice: This is a non-exhaustive list of devices supported by Versatile Thermostat. If you don't see your device, it may not been added yet. Consult the documentation for instructions how configure your device.

conf.title: Device configuration
conf.finnaly: You can validate and return to the configuration menu.

step1.title: Initialization
step1.section: Go to your settings, then integrations, then click on add a new integration. Search for Versatile Thermostat.
step1.over_climate: Click on Thermostat over another thermostat.
step1.over_switch: Click on Thermostat over a switch.
step1.over_valve: Click on Thermostat over a valve.

step2.title: Basic attributes
step2.task1: Choose a name for your thermostat
step2.task2: Set the temperature sensor for your room
step2.task3: If you are using the Zigbee protocol and you have a "last_seen" entity for your temperature sensor, fill it in.

step3.title: Underlying entities
step3.section: Go to the underlying entities section.
step3.over_climate: Add the thermostats that will be controlled
step3.over_valve: Add the valves that will be controlled
step3.over_switch: Add the switches that will be controlled
step3.use_regulation: In the auto-regulation section, choose "direct valve control"

step4.title: TPI parameters
step4.section: Go to the "TPI parameters" section. Uncheck the central configuration and proceed to the next screen. Configure the following values:
step4.activation_delay: Set {{delay}} as the minimum activation delay.
step4.deactivation_delay: Set {{delay}} as the minimum deactivation delay.
